title: Aldo Cubilla
text:
Aldo Sebastián Cubilla Bogado (born 8 January 2001) is a Paraguayan-American <a href="association%20football">footballer</a> who plays as a <a href="Midfielder">left midfielder</a> for <a href="Paraguayan%20Primera%20Divisi%C3%B3n">Paraguayan Primera División</a> side <a href="Club%20Sol%20de%20Am%C3%A9rica">Club Sol de América</a>.
Career.
Club career.
Born in the <a href="United%20States">United States</a>, however of Paraguayan origin, Cubilla is a product of <a href="Club%20Sol%20de%20Am%C3%A9rica">Sol de América</a> which he joined in 2008. On 14 July 2019, Cubilla got his official debut for <a href="Club%20Sol%20de%20Am%C3%A9rica">Sol de América</a> in the <a href="Paraguayan%20Primera%20Divisi%C3%B3n">Paraguayan Primera División</a> against <a href="Club%20Nacional">Club Nacional</a>, where he was in the starting lineup. Cubilla was also in the starting lineup in the following five matches in a row. He made a total of 7 appearances for the team in the 2019 season. In the 2020 season, Cubilla played no games for the first team and was only on the bench for one game.
